ChatMapperProject.Title: Standard Project
ChatMapperProject.Description: Default project with two actors and default asset fields.

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: A name to reference this actor.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this actor.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what makes this actor unique.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: Mark this box if this actor is the main player character.
Field.Title: IsPlayer

Field.Hint: A name to reference this item.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this item.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what this item looks like.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: A name to reference this location.
Field.Title: Name

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this location.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what this location looks like.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: The title of this conversation.
Field.Title: Title

Field.Hint: A collection of image files that represent this conversation. The first is used as the background image.
Field.Title: Pictures

Field.Hint: A short description of what happens in this conversation.
Field.Title: Description

Field.Hint: The actor who is doing most of the talking, or initiates this conversation.
Field.Title: Actor

Field.Hint: The actor who is approached or is mostly talked to.
Field.Title: Conversant

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Title: Dialogue Text

Field.Hint: A description of what is going on during this dialogue.
Field.Title: Parenthetical

Field.Hint: A collection of audio files that should be played during this dialogue.
Field.Title: Audio Files

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: A collection of animation files that should be played during this dialogue.
Field.Title: Animation Files

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: That’s a promotional poster for “Barbarulo”, based on the original 1967 script.| An Italian space opera about a heavily mustachioed amazon from the future in a mission to rekindle humanity’s sex drive.| The plot was heavily revised after the French Co-Producers signed on.

Field.Value: My signed print of the “Pink Side of the Space Station” cover art, a cult classic among synchronization enthusiasts everywhere.| Much better than that Rainbow nonsense.

Field.Value: I wonder if it’s still anatidaephobia if you know for a fact you are being watched by a creepy, albeit rubber, duck.| It gives me the creeps.
